Yes! Uppsala University offers language courses as well as exchange programs that focus on language immersion. Here are a few options to consider:

1. Language courses: Uppsala University offers language courses in several languages, including Swedish, English, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, Arabic, and more. These courses can be taken alongside regular academic courses or as standalone language courses. 2. Erasmus+ Language Assistants: Erasmus+ offers a unique opportunity to become a language assistant in another European country. You can apply as an Erasmus+ Language Assistant during your studies or as a recent graduate. This is an opportunity to live in another country while perfecting your language skills. 3. Intensive Language Immersion Programs: Uppsala University offers intensive language immersion programs that allow students to spend several weeks or months in a country where the language is spoken. These programs are a great way to improve your language skills while immersing yourself in the culture. 4. Language Exchange Program: The language exchange program offers opportunities to practice and improve your language skills with native speakers through exchanges and personal engagement. You can find more information about language programs on the Uppsala University's website.
